creator: mprice@atl.lmco.com
text:
In jetty 4.2.21 it appears as though org.mortbay.jetty.plus.Server is now
org.mortbay.jetty.Server. A file in the tests/src tree uses the old package name
which prevents the tests from building.

Created attachment 12294
Patch to resolve this issue.
creator: mprice@atl.lmco.com
yoavs@computer.org
text: Fixed, thanks for pointing it out.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
Altough I might be wrong but I very much doubt org.mortbay.jetty.plus.Server is 
not required for JNDI testing. The PassByJNDITest is currently exluded form the 
tests/ build it does not matter either way.

I am reverting this change. We'll put it back if necessary when we start working 
on PassByJNDITest again.
